basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm a M.Sc student of computer science at the University of Insubria, Varese. During my Bachelor's degree I fell in love with web and mobile development, and my efforts in this field were rewarded by finding a part-time job as a full-stack Agile web developer that I carried on during my studies. On my Master's degree I deepened topics about machine learning, privacy, cryptography and blockchain, with which I am doing my thesis.

projects.title: Tracenet
projects.description: An Hyperledger Fabric blockchain network that I built from scratch to learn blockchain basics. The programming skills required were golang for the smart contract and bash scripting to interact with the network

projects.title: Oak's Desk
projects.description: This project was thought to provide competitive pokemon players an API to find insightful information that other popular websites don't provide.

projects.title: Workout Clock
projects.description: This application was designed during the Covid19 pandemic. I wanted to encourage users to train themselves and develop healthy habits. The application features a highly customizable HIIT timer and a chronometer with charts visualization to track progress
